Class: exports

exports

Manages the HORIZONTAL and VERTICAL size polices of a widget

new exports(hostWidget, hPolicy, vPolicy)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
hostWidget Widget

the widget this layout manager belongs to
hPolicy BasePolicy

HORIZONTAL Policy - defaults to FixedPolicy
vPolicy BasePolicy

VERTICAL Policy - defaults to FixedPolicy

Class: exports

exports

new exports(hostWidget [, orientation])

Parameters:

hostWidget Widget

the widget this policy belongs to
orientation number <optional>

exports

Class: exports

exports

Abstract base class for all size policies

<abstract> new exports(hostWidget [, orientation])

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
hostWidget Widget

the widget this policy belongs to
orientation number <optional>
 HORIZONTAL

the orientation of the policy

Members

<private> _bottom :Number

Class: exports

exports

Creates and holds graphics and textures for a theme. Graphics should be created large enough so they can be scaled down without loss of quality. This way the same graphics can be used throughout without redrawing for every widget resize.

new exports()

Class: exports

exports

Special callback functions that are connected to Signals. When the Signal 'emits', the slot's callback function is executed with data from the signal. Note: Observer pattern

new exports( [context] [, callback] [, data] [, useOnce])

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
context Object <optional>
 null

contextual this
callback function <optional>
 null

actual callback function
data Number | String | Array | function | Object <optional>
 null

data to pass if nothing is passed from the signal
useOnce Boolean <optional>
 false

if true, the signal will disconnect after first emit

Class: exports

exports

Expanding Policy causes children to expand in the given direction filling the parent. Note: This Policy doesn't respect siblings - best for widgets with a s a sigle child.

new exports(hostWidget [, orientation])

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
hostWidget Widget

the widget this policy belongs to
orientation number <optional>
 HORIZONTAL

the orientation of the policy

Class: exports

exports

Alignment class holds alignment policies for horizontal and vertical alignments - alignments are static callback methods that return a relative position offset for the widget to its parent.

new exports( [hAlign] [, vAlign])

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
hAlign function <optional>
 Alignment.left

default left align
vAlign function <optional>
 Alignment.top

default top align
